name: ibm-xforce-vulnerabilities
label: IBM X-Force Vulnerabilities
description: Provides details on a vulnerability and links to relevant online documents and CVSS scoring with component breakdown.

parameters.title: Start Date
parameters.name: startDate
parameters.tooltip: Specify the start of the date range for searching. For example, 2016-01-01T00:00:00Z. Must not be later than endDate. If not specified, the range will not be restricted.
parameters.description: Specify the start of the date range for searching. For example, 2016-01-01T00:00:00Z. Must not be later than endDate. If not specified, the range will not be restricted.

parameters.title: End Date
parameters.name: endDate
parameters.tooltip: Specify the end of the date range for searching. If not specified, the query will return the newest IPs.
parameters.description: Specify the end of the date range for searching. If not specified, the query will return the newest IPs.

parameters.title: Descending
parameters.name: descending
parameters.tooltip: Specify the order of returned Vulnerabilities according to the updated date, default value is true.
parameters.description: Specify The order of returned Vulnerabilities according to the updated date, default value is true.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of vulnerabilities to be returned.
parameters.description: Specify the number of vulnerabilities to be returned.

parameters.title: Skip
parameters.name: skip
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of Vulnerabilities to be skipped while searching.
parameters.description: Specify the number of Vulnerabilities to be skipped while searching.

operations.title: Get Updated Vulnerabilities
operations.description: Returns a list of vulnerabilities that were updated

parameters.title: Start Date
parameters.name: startDate
parameters.tooltip: Specify the start of the date range for searching. e.g. 2016-01-01T00:00:00Z. Must not be later than endDate. If not specified, the range will not be restricted.
parameters.description: Specify the start of the date range for searching. e.g. 2016-01-01T00:00:00Z. Must not be later than endDate. If not specified, the range will not be restricted.

parameters.title: End Date
parameters.name: endDate
parameters.tooltip: Specify the end of the date range for searching. If not specified, the range will not be restricted.
parameters.description: Specify the end of the date range for searching. If not specified, the range will not be restricted.

parameters.title: Descending
parameters.name: descending
parameters.tooltip: Specify the order of returned Vulnerabilities according to the updated date, default value is true.
parameters.description: Specify the order of returned Vulnerabilities according to the updated date, default value is true.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of vulnerabilities to be returned. default value is 200. The limit must not be larger than 200
parameters.description: Specify the number of vulnerabilities to be returned. default value is 200. The limit must not be larger than 200

parameters.title: Skip
parameters.name: skip
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of Vulnerabilities to be skipped while searching.
parameters.description: Specify the number of Vulnerabilities to be skipped while searching.

operations.title: Search Vulnerabilities
operations.description: Returns list of all vulnerabilities associated with the search term.

parameters.title: Start Date
parameters.name: startDate
parameters.tooltip: Specify the start of the date range for searching. e.g. 2016-01-01T00:00:00Z. Must not be later than endDate. If not specified, the range will not be restricted.
parameters.description: Specify the start of the date range for searching. e.g. 2016-01-01T00:00:00Z. Must not be later than endDate. If not specified, the range will not be restricted.

parameters.title: End Date
parameters.name: endDate
parameters.tooltip: Specify the end of the date range for searching. If not specified, the range will not be restricted.
parameters.description: Specify the end of the date range for searching. If not specified, the range will not be restricted.

parameters.title: Bookmark
parameters.name: bookmark
parameters.tooltip: Bookmark used to page through results.
parameters.description: Bookmark used to page through results.

operations.title: Get Vulnerabilities by XFID
operations.description: Returns the vulnerability associated with the entered xfdbid.

operations.title: Get Vulnerabilities by STDCODE
operations.description: Returns the vulnerability associated with the entered stdcode

parameters.title: STD Code
parameters.name: stdcode
parameters.tooltip: Search term, For example, CVE-2014-2601, BID-69453, US-CERT VU#546340, RHSA20131456.
parameters.description: Search term, For example, CVE-2014-2601, BID-69453, US-CERT VU#546340, RHSA20131456.

operations.title: Get Vulnerabilities by Microsoft Security Bulletin ID
operations.description: Returns the vulnerability associated with the entered stdcode

parameters.title: MSID
parameters.name: msid
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Microsoft Security Bulletin ID.
parameters.description: Specify the Microsoft Security Bulletin ID .
